title: Textile, 12th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain compound cloth
description: Dark blue silk cloth crossed at half inch intervals by bands of geometric repeats with guard bands above and below formed by pale yellow, pale blue and black wefts. One plain selvage, at right angles to bands, terminating in pale yellow silk cord.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 12th century.
12th century. Medium: silk
Technique: plain compound cloth. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-36.
